title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.7 - Posting tariffs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.7 - Posting tariffs

State Regulations

Each carrier must post and file, at each of its stations
or offices at which an agent is employed, all the tariffs or supplements
applying from, or at, such station or office, and must also post and file at
its principal place of business all its tariffs. All tariffs must be made
available for public inspection or examination at all reasonable times without
requiring the assignment of any reason for such inspection or
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
826.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
